title: Gas Station Attendance & Tank Meter Tracker
description: In just few days, I built a gas station attendance and tank meter tracker using Directus for the backend and a PWA with Next.js to ensures accurate attendance logging and real-time tank volume records.

title: Wealth Bonds Trading API
description: I contributed to building backend services for Maybank Indonesia, focusing on secondary bonds. My work included developing features for bond registration, verification, buying, selling, and redemption.

title: Automated Whatsapp Service
description: I created a wrapper that allows interaction with WhatsApp via REST API or a scheduler.

title: Automated Continous Integration & Deployment
description: I responsible to managing the Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline to ensure seamless building and delivery of backend services and NuGet packages across a global edge network.

title: Network Monitoring System
description: I built a network monitoring system that visualizes networks using topology and map views. This allows me to instantly identify where issues are occurring, making network management faster and more effective.

title: Event Driven Affiliate and Rewarding System
description: I built an event-driven affiliate and rewarding system to an e-commerce platform to ensure fast and accurate calculation payouts. With a simple tech generates Billion IDR per month efficiently.

title: High Performance and SEO Freindly News Portal
description: I built high performace and SEO friendly news portal that supports multiple authors, an editorial workflow, content recommendations, ads management, user interactions like reactions and comments, and is optimized for high performance and SEO.

title: Zonation Based Enrollment System
description: Develop a zone-based enrollment system to comply ministry of education policy. This system includes school management, timetable management, resgistration, and applicant sorting based on distance and report card grades.
